name: Ninja Art: Super Erotic Mist
statusOutcome: Con lo preocupado [TargetName] actualmente, [AttackerName] se las arregla fácilmente para acercarse a los labios [AttackerHisOrHer], y sopla una gruesa nube de niebla rosada directamente en la cara de [TargetName], haciendo que [TargetHimOrHer] temble como involuntariamente¡Respira un poco, haciendo que [TargetHimOrHer] se sienta caliente y cachondo!
statusMiss: With how preoccupied [TargetName] currently is, [AttackerName] easily manages to get in close, purse [AttackerHisOrHer] lips, and blows a thick cloud of pink mist directly into [TargetName]'s face, but [TargetHeOrShe] manages to hold [TargetHisOrHer] breath long enough for it to dissipate!
